body_html:
@mrry

$ which ipython3
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/ipython3

$ which jupyter
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/jupyter

$ which python3
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/python3

the latter being a link to python3.5

I think I am having troubles with my jupyter install... Ipython and python3.5 use Python 3.5, but from within the Jupyter notebook:

>>> import sys
>>> print(sys.version)
3.4.3 (default, Mar 31 2016, 20:42:37) 
[GCC 5.3.1 20151207 (Red Hat 5.3.1-2)]

This is very strange. I will investigate further.

body:
@mrry 

```
$ which ipython3
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/ipython3

$ which jupyter
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/jupyter

$ which python3
~/.virtualenvs/tensorflow-dev/bin/python3
```

the latter being a link to python3.5

I think I am having troubles with my jupyter install... Ipython and python3.5 use Python 3.5, but from within the Jupyter notebook:

```
>>> import sys
>>> print(sys.version)
3.4.3 (default, Mar 31 2016, 20:42:37) 
[GCC 5.3.1 20151207 (Red Hat 5.3.1-2)]
```

This is very strange. I will investigate further.
